Package com.camerontec.util.io

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ExternalizableData
    Interface to be implemented by classes capable of serializing to and deserializing from a Buffer.
    IBytesSegmentExternalizer<T>
    Interface to be implemented by classes capable of serializing/deserializing objects to/from BytesSegments.
    IDataExternalizable Deprecated
    This interface and its implementations are likely to be removed in a future release.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ByteArrayUtils
    Utility methods for converting between native types and their big endian byte array representations.
    BytesSegmentDataInputStream
    Specialized java.io.InputStream which uses a BytesSegment as its data source and also provides java.io.DataInput capabilities.
    BytesSegmentDataOutputStream
    Specialized java.io.OutputStream which uses a BytesSegment as its data sink and also provides java.io.DataOutput capabilities.
    BytesSegmentInputStream
    Specialization of an java.io.InputStream which uses a BytesSegment as its data source.
    BytesSegmentOutputStream
    Specialization of an java.io.OutputStream which uses a BytesSegment as its data sink.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BytesSegmentExternalizationException
    Instances of this unchecked exception class are thrown to report errors during the externalization of BytesSegments.
